PC Number: 2010-0931

Date: 2010-07-09

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Michel Arpin, Vice-Chairperson and Member, Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 7 ($190,400 - $224,000), effective April 1, 2010.
